bodiesApproached: {sessionTotalBodiesApproached, plural, one{First planetary entry} other{Planetary entry number #}} of the day
bodiesLeft: {sessionTotalBodiesLeft, plural, one{First time leaving a planet} other{# bodies left}} today
bounty1: BOOM! That Pirate and his {lastBountyShip} were eliminated! ({cr})
bounty2: {sessionTotalPiratesKilled, plural, one{} other{That was the {sessionTotalPiratesKilled, selectordinal, one{1st pirate} two{2nd pirate} few{3rd pirate} other{#th pirate}} of today for a total of {totalCr}}}
dockingsDenied1: {sessionTotalDockingsDenied, plural, one{Docking permit denied ({lastDockingDeniedReason})} other{Another denied docking ({lastDockingDeniedReason})...}}
dockingsDenied2: {sessionTotalDockingsDenied, plural, one{} other{That was the {sessionTotalDockingsDenied, selectordinal, two{2nd} few{3rd} other{#th}} docking denied today}}
dockingsGranted: That was the {sessionTotalDockingsGranted, selectordinal, one{1st} two{2nd} few{3rd} other{#th}} docking request granted today
dockingsRequested: {sessionTotalDockingsRequested, selectordinal, one{First} two{Second} few{Third} other{#th}} docking request in this game session
heatWarning: {sessionTotalHeatWarnings, plural, one{First overheat of the day!} other{Heat Warning! The ship has overheated already {sessionTotalHeatWarnings} times today}}
interdictionsEscaped: We have escaped {sessionTotalInterdictionsReceivedEscaped, plural, one{our first interdiction} other{# interdictions already}} today
interdictionsLost: {sessionTotalInterdictionsReceivedLost, selectordinal, one{First} two{Second} few{Third} other{#th}} interdiction we lose today :(
interdictionsSubmitted: {sessionTotalInterdictionsReceivedSubmitted, plural, one{First interdiction where we submit today!} other{Today we have submitted to {sessionTotalInterdictionsReceivedSubmitted} interdictions already!}}
jumpDistance: We have jumped already more than {sessionTotalJumpDistance} today!
launchedDrones: We have used {sessionTotalDronesLaunched, plural, one{one drone} other {# drones}} today
materialCollected: {sessionTotalMaterialsCollected, plural, one{1 material} other{# materials}} collected today
miningRefined: {sessionTotalMiningRefined, plural, one{First ton of mineral refined} other{We have refined # tons of mineral}} in this game session!
missionsAbandoned: {sessionTotalMissionsAbandoned, plural, one{First mission dropped today =_=} other{We have abandoned {sessionTotalMissionsAbandoned} missions just today...}}
missionsAccepted: {sessionTotalMissionsAccepted, plural, one{Here comes the first mission of the day!} other{We've just accepted our {sessionTotalMissionsAccepted, selectordinal, two{second} few{third} other{#th}} mission of the day}}
missionsCompleted: {sessionTotalMissionsCompleted, plural, one{First completed mission of the day!} other{This is the {sessionTotalMissionsCompleted, selectordinal, two{second} few{third} other{#th}} completed mission of the day}}
missionsFailed: {sessionTotalMissionsFailed, plural, one{First mission failed today :(} other{We have failed {sessionTotalMissionsFailed} missions just today...}}
prospectedAsteroids: We have prospected {sessionTotalAsteroidsProspected, plural, one{our first asteroid} other{# asteroids}} today
scanned: {sessionTotalScanned, plural, one{First time we have been scanned today!} other{Just today, we have been scanned {sessionTotalScanned} times already!}}
